
{{Client function}}

{{New feature/item|9.0150|1.5.0|7048|
This function sets the color for a [[/Element/Light.md|light]] element.
}}

==Syntax==
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
bool setLightColor ( light theLight, float r, float g, float b )
</syntaxhighlight>
{{OOP||[[/light.md|light]]:setColor|color|getLightColor}}

===Required Arguments=== 
*'''theLight:''' The [[/Element/Light.md|light]] that you wish to set the color of.

=== Returns ===
Returns ''true'' if the function was successful, ''false'' otherwise.

===Example===
<syntaxhighlight lang="Lua">
local light = createLight(1, 2, 3, 4)
addCommandHandler("setcoloroflight",
	function(cmd, r, g, b)
		if r and g and b then
			setLightColor(light, tonumber(r), tonumber(g), tonumber(b))
               end
	end
)
</syntaxhighlight>
